articles.title: Sabrina Ionescu ties Candace Parker's career triple-doubles record in historic performance for New York Liberty
articles.description: Sabrina Ionescu registered the third triple-double of her career -- and the highest-scoring triple-double in WNBA history -- as the Liberty prevailed in an offensive showdown with the Aces on Wednesday.
articles.content:
The New York Liberty set a franchise record for points as guard Sabrina Ionescu got her second triple-double of the season in a 116-107 victory at the Las Vegas Aces on Wednesday.

articles.title: Nick Kyrgios reaches men's singles semifinals at Wimbledon
articles.description: Australian Nick Kyrgios, who is currently ranked No. 40 in the world, beat Cristian Garin to become the lowest ranked and first unseeded men's semifinalist at Wimbledon since 2008.
articles.content:
LONDON -- Nick Kyrgios advanced to the semifinals at a Grand Slam tournament for the first time by beating Cristian Garin 6-4, 6-3, 7-6 (5) on Centre Court at Wimbledon on Wednesday.
